title: iluvrainbow
author: iluvrainbow
content: I'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.I don't have time to provide text and images for the websites.I will give you only the topic amd you create the new blog and you write few articles with few images. All can be generated with AI!You create the new site under the domain and hosting I will provide you.Later I might have more complex website projects like eCommerce sites.For now, I need a simple WP blog.If you are intersted, send me per PN your Telegram account username or post it here ( I communicate mostly with  Telegram).Payment method: BITCOIN only

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: I know WordPress but I'm not offering WordPress setup service this one just intrigues me Quote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMLater I might have more complex website projects like eCommerce sites.If part of your goal is to become a webmaster, then starting a WP blog is your stepping stone to more complex sites I always recommend to aspiring webmasters learn how to code how to design their website so in case there are issues you are not paying freelancers again and again for simple issues if its WordPress you can set it up easily and use this site for a step by step https://www.wpbeginner.com/start-a-wordpress-blog/ What you can learn from setting up a WP blog you can apply some of it on a more complex site like an E-commerce site.

comments.author: PixxelDesign
comments.body: I can help you out with the wp site and with more complex solutions as well.Contact me on Telegram: cryptopixxel

comments.author: PixxelDesign
comments.body: Made the site for him and he paid me, legit guy

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyYou know that things don't go exactly as you are trying to portray. I'm not going to get into a deeper discussion about whether you're being honest here, but you come after a long inactivity here on the forum, in less than 24 hours you made an agreement and finish the job.After that, you leave this kind of feedback.Simulating successfully completed work by creating an alt account is not desirable anywhere, not even on this forum.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on July 31, 2023, 12:23:46 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyYou know that things don't go exactly as you are trying to portray. I'm not going to get into a deeper discussion about whether you're being honest here, but you come after a long inactivity here on the forum, in less than 24 hours you made an agreement and finish the job.After that, you leave this kind of feedback.Simulating successfully completed work by creating an alt account is not desirable anywhere, not even on this forum.Interesting finding it's not even 24 hours part of the deal is QuoteI will give you only the topic amd you create the new blog and you write few articles with few images. All can be generated with AI!You create the new site under the domain and hosting I will provide youIt's very fast to complete all of these, Fiverr the completion takes 24 hours in my case with my first blog post it usually takes 30 hours complete with plugins, I have the same suspicion if it's ok please post the created WP blog with all the tasks created.

comments.author: PixxelDesign
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on July 31, 2023, 12:23:46 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyYou know that things don't go exactly as you are trying to portray. I'm not going to get into a deeper discussion about whether you're being honest here, but you come after a long inactivity here on the forum, in less than 24 hours you made an agreement and finish the job.After that, you leave this kind of feedback.Simulating successfully completed work by creating an alt account is not desirable anywhere, not even on this forum.I am not posting that often, that's true, however the task itself took 2 hours, and as I was the only one who applied, it's not a surprise he chose me. You can contact me on TG to clarify, but making this kind of accusation instantly is not really kind...

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 02:25:18 PMQuote from: examplens on July 31, 2023, 12:23:46 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyYou know that things don't go exactly as you are trying to portray. I'm not going to get into a deeper discussion about whether you're being honest here, but you come after a long inactivity here on the forum, in less than 24 hours you made an agreement and finish the job.After that, you leave this kind of feedback.Simulating successfully completed work by creating an alt account is not desirable anywhere, not even on this forum.I am not posting that often, that's true, however the task itself took 2 hours, and as I was the only one who applied, it's not a surprise he chose me. You can contact me on TG to clarify, but making this kind of accusation instantly is not really kind...It is nice you could finish such task within a short time interval. I know for sure anything that has to do with website design takes a long time to work upon no matter how small it is. Based on the possible suspicion, do you not think providing those details as requested would save you some doubt and you gaining some trust? from members here because as it stands now, there are some doubt in the minds of people here even if you are the only one who applied for the job. If you go as far as providing the details as requested you just might earn a good reputation here for a good and fast service delivery and possibly get recommendation for job as the case maybe.  If you have done other jobs as well, you can as well put the links here for us to see.

comments.author: PixxelDesign
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on July 31, 2023, 03:48:24 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 02:25:18 PMQuote from: examplens on July 31, 2023, 12:23:46 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyYou know that things don't go exactly as you are trying to portray. I'm not going to get into a deeper discussion about whether you're being honest here, but you come after a long inactivity here on the forum, in less than 24 hours you made an agreement and finish the job.After that, you leave this kind of feedback.Simulating successfully completed work by creating an alt account is not desirable anywhere, not even on this forum.I am not posting that often, that's true, however the task itself took 2 hours, and as I was the only one who applied, it's not a surprise he chose me. You can contact me on TG to clarify, but making this kind of accusation instantly is not really kind...It is nice you could finish such task within a short time interval. I know for sure anything that has to do with website design takes a long time to work upon no matter how small it is. Based on the possible suspicion, do you not think providing those details as requested would save you some doubt and you gaining some trust? from members here because as it stands now, there are some doubt in the minds of people here even if you are the only one who applied for the job. If you go as far as providing the details as requested you just might earn a good reputation here for a good and fast service delivery and possibly get recommendation for job as the case maybe.  If you have done other jobs as well, you can as well put the links here for us to see.It was a basic Wordpress website with an already done theme, and some AI generated posts as the original post said, that's why it took only 2 hours. I asked for permission if I can post the site.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 02:25:18 PMI am not posting that often, that's true, however the task itself took 2 hours, and as I was the only one who applied, it's not a surprise he chose me. I think that this kind of task requires more than 2 hours of work. If it is as you say, it only means that you provided poor quality just to make easy money. But that's just the impression that I got while following the show on this topic.QuoteYou can contact me on TG to clarify, but making this kind of accusation instantly is not really kind...]You can contact me on TG to clarify, but making this kind of accusation instantly is not really kind...I said earlier that I am not interested in a deeper analysis of this case. I just don't think it's worth the effort.Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 04:01:53 PMI asked for permission if I can post the site. You made me interested in how this case will develop further.

comments.author: iluvrainbow
comments.body: Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyI can confirm this

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: iluvrainbow on July 31, 2023, 04:14:51 PMQuote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 11:26:08 AMMade the site for him and he paid me, legit guyI can confirm thisIf you claim so and you are vouching for him, It is good of you to do so as this would help him a lot. Could you do well to give us link to the site let us have a good look at his skill and possibly make some recommendation because the speed at which the website was designed is very fascinating  and it shows how good he is at his work. This could help do some marketing for him and boast his work capacity. This could also give members here ideas of what you offer if there is any need to patronize you.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.How much are you willing to pay for the simple WP?As you are a newbie, you really would need a escrow or you will need to pay some upfront.I don't use telegram, but  I have some experience. You can check the website on my personal text.

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on July 31, 2023, 04:47:09 PMQuote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.How much are you willing to pay for the simple WP?As you are a newbie, you really would need a escrow or you will need to pay some upfront.I don't use telegram, but  I have some experience. You can check the website on my personal text.He didn't want to use an escrow. He insisted on paying after the work is completed. Which is a no go for me(or any other sane person).I'm also surprised that he managed to find someone to do this work for him, as he told me  that he's going to do it himself on telegram.

comments.author: iluvrainbow

You can check the website on my personal text.He didn't want to use an escrow. He insisted on paying after the work is completed. Which is a no go for me(or any other sane person).I'm also surprised that he managed to find someone to do this work for him, as he told me  that he's going to do it himself on telegram.yeahhI finally found someone who did the job and I paid him as you can see   Topic can be closed now

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on July 31, 2023, 04:47:09 PMHow much are you willing to pay for the simple WP?As you are a newbie, you really would need a escrow or you will need to pay some upfront.I don't use telegram, but  I have some experience. You can check the website on my personal text.He is a troll, he should not be taken seriously.Quote from: iluvrainbow on July 31, 2023, 05:48:28 PMyeahhI finally found someone who did the job and I paid him as you can see   Topic can be closed nowI looked at your history of posts here on the forum. Sounds funny  On 11 April 2020, you trying to find someone for a web design task:Quote from: iluvrainbow on April 11, 2020, 03:52:39 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, modern and beautiful websites. Usually one page.I don't have time to provide text and images for the websites.I will give you only the topic and a similar site. You create the new site under the domain and hosting I will provide you.Later I might have more complex website projects like eCommerce sites.For now, I need for tomorrow a simple website.Please contact me on  Telegram  if you are interested.'#### No more Aplication for now please ####Payment method: BITCOIN onlyIn just 20 minutes, you made a deal without concrete confirmation on the forum. Really excellent for someone who is a complete newbie here.Now this threadQuote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.I don't have time to provide text and images for the websites.I will give you only the topic amd you create the new blog and you write few articles with few images. All can be generated with AI!You create the new site under the domain and hosting I will provide you.Later I might have more complex website projects like eCommerce sites.For now, I need a simple WP blog.If you are intersted, send me per PN your Telegram account username or post it here ( I communicate mostly with  Telegram).Payment method: BITCOIN onlyIt's obvious you're trolling here.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: iluvrainbow on July 31, 2023, 05:48:28 PMQuote from: PaulBf1 on July 31, 2023, 05:26:12 PMQuote from: bitmover on July 31, 2023, 04:47:09 PMQuote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.How much are you willing to pay for the simple WP?As you are a newbie, you really would need a escrow or you will need to pay some upfront.I don't use telegram, but  I have some experience. You can check the website on my personal text.He didn't want to use an escrow. He insisted on paying after the work is completed. Which is a no go for me(or any other sane person).I'm also surprised that he managed to find someone to do this work for him, as he told me  that he's going to do it himself on telegram.yeahhI finally found someone who did the job and I paid him as you can see   Topic can be closed nowYou and the one you hired are being questioned if there's a completed deal why not end this thread by just posting the site that the designer created with all the details that you've given to be completed, that's how this topic will end and not alluding to what members are requesting.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on July 31, 2023, 11:58:36 PMQuote from: iluvrainbow on July 31, 2023, 05:48:28 PMQuote from: PaulBf1 on July 31, 2023, 05:26:12 PMQuote from: bitmover on July 31, 2023, 04:47:09 PMQuote from: iluvrainbow on July 29, 2023, 09:56:29 PMI'm looking for Webdesigners to build simple, and mordern WP blog based on the Topic I will provide.How much are you willing to pay for the simple WP?As you are a newbie, you really would need a escrow or you will need to pay some upfront.I don't use telegram, but  I have some experience. You can check the website on my personal text.He didn't want to use an escrow. He insisted on paying after the work is completed. Which is a no go for me(or any other sane person).I'm also surprised that he managed to find someone to do this work for him, as he told me  that he's going to do it himself on telegram.yeahhI finally found someone who did the job and I paid him as you can see   Topic can be closed nowYou and the one you hired are being questioned if there's a completed deal why not end this thread by just posting the site that the designer created with all the details that you've given to be completed, that's how this topic will end and not alluding to what members are requesting.I was wondering as well. No escrow, no payment terms and conditions, no amount, no proof. I thought on the normal, doing business here with someone you know nothing about would require you to be extremely cautious and careful so as not to be scammed. Looking at the nature of the job I think it should be above a hundred dollar buck for a start but I was also thinking as well how come it could take up to them 2hours to round up. Well I do not doubt his capacity but I am only curious about the whole thing or would he not want to promote his works here for us to see so we could applaud him and make recommendations for him.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: PixxelDesign on July 31, 2023, 04:01:53 PMIt was a basic Wordpress website with an already done theme, and some AI generated posts as the original post said, that's why it took only 2 hours. I asked for permission if I can post the site. Yeah, I agree basic WordPress website can be set up even in a matter of minutes if the domain is not new and is already propagated I always do this on my own sites I just fix the permalink and just come back later to see what plugins to be added based on the theme of the site.But it's different when you're offering a set-up business, there should be an agreed turnaround time even if it's the simplest and basic usually 24 hours even if the set up took a couple of hours, is there a discussion about the time frame or you sent the site when set up is already done.I hope your client agreed to post the site you've set up for us to see this will become a reference on how good and how fast you are.

comments.author: iluvrainbow
comments.body: Too much comments here for nothing.I understand you guys are just interested in your stats.Job was done and paid. That's all. It's a private job, I'm not going to post my website(s) here sorry.Also the previous jos done by TC in 2020, all were fine. If you have doubt, you can contact him. He is not newbie on this forum.Topic will be closed now to avoid unnecessary discussion here.Whenever I need new developers, I will post here as always
